title: Bug 13725 - Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
description: Bug 13725 - Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
OB: When answering 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog and double-clicking on the file in the navigator to reopen it, selecting 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original.
EB: Reverting the file contents should not take more time than simply closing and reopening the file.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog. 2) Double-click on the file in the navigator to reopen it. 3) Select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor.
